content.9.1 Overview of Deployment: ObeliskOS is deployed as a .exe via packager.py, with expansion handled through Brancher and tablet artifacts (.tablet files).

9.2 Deployment Process.Description: Compiled using PyInstaller, validated with bootstrap_obeliskos.py.

Technical Specifications.Deployment: No external dependencies, validated with 1,000,000 iterations, achieving a DRI of 0.0.
Technical Specifications.Practical Use Case: In blockchain, the .exe is deployed on a standalone node, ensuring autonomy.

9.3 Symbolic Expansion.Description: Brancher enables expansion, validated with 1,000,000 iterations, achieving an ESI of 0.9997.
9.3 Symbolic Expansion.Practical Use Case: In modding, a new Key is integrated, ensuring stable expansion.

9.4 Tablet Artifacts.Description: Tablet artifacts (.tablet) distribute symbolic runtimes, validated with validate.py.

Technical Specifications.Practical Use Case: In blockchain, a .tablet file distributes a transaction Key, ensuring portability.
